text: @GSK Psyop BS. Anthony Fauci and the Angel of death Bill Gates manufactured Covid-19 so if there is a anti-vaccine,  it’s already been made & seriously question the veracity of a vaccine being needed. Maybe vitamin A,C,D & K2?
